channel.title: REP++ For Help! Can't Run Client
channel.description:
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
run.bat
[code] @echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
[/code]

item.title: REP++ For Help! Can't Run Client
item.dc:creator: @ethanhello ethanhello
item.description:
@ethanhello wrote:

im getting the exact same errors as blitz, and the same errors for all these new versions of run

The system cannot find the path specified. Error: Could not find or load main class client Press any key to continue . . .

thats what i got from that last one…

Read full topic
item.source: REP++ For Help! Can't Run Client

item.title: REP++ For Help! Can't Run Client
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

Here Blitz…

Is it PI? if so this may be it:

@echo off
title Client
cd bin
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m client 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

Read full topic

item.title: REP++ For Help! Can't Run Client
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

imsuperman05:

Lool don’t tv with him Blitz. Show me your old run.bat, and a picture or info on the directory to JDK.

My run.bat only has

java client

it use to work fine on windows xp and now on my new computer it doesnt

this is what i get

C:\Users\Welcome\Dropbox\RuneX-Client\RuneX-Fullscreen>java client
Error: Could not find or load main class client

And here is my Path

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0

item.title: REP++ For Help! Can't Run Client
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

[quote=“p00n99range, post:6, topic:412825”][quote author=Get Blitz link=topic=514299.msg3733354#msg3733354 date=1314746706]
I just got a Windows 7 computer and i can’t run my client

this is my run.bat
[/code]
java client
[/code]

And this is what i get

C:\Users\Welcome\Dropbox\RuneX-Client\RuneX-Fullscreen>java client
Error: Could not find or load main class client

[/quote]

[code]@echo off
title Client
cd ./Class/
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

[/code][/quote]
I assume you ripped that straight out of your client? No wonder it doesn’t work.

@Ix Soulcist xI
Although that may be a problem when he starts the client, if you read the error, you can see its actually a problem with it not finding “client.class”

Read full topic
